title: Ed Miliband – 2022 Comments on BP’s Profits
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ed Miliband, the Shadow Energy Secretary, on Twitter on 1 November 2022.
content:
Today’s BP profits are damning evidence of the failure of the Tories to levy a proper windfall tax.
